prompt:
I have the following count table for an RNA-seq experiment, rows are genes and columns are samples, "Supplementary_Table_1_exp.xlsx". The first column of the file is my gene names and the rest of the columns are samples. My annotation data is here  "SRP021193.colData.tsv", it contains sample annotations and rows of this matches the columns of count table, first column is the sample ids. Read the tables count number of rows and columns for each.

here are first few lines of the file(s).

Supplementary_Table_1_exp.xlsx:
Genes	CASE_1	CASE_2	CASE_3	CASE_4	CASE_5	CASE_6	CTRL_1	CTRL_2	CTRL_3	CTRL_4	CTRL_5	CTRL_6
TSPAN6	9832	25521	23529	0	32	0	10558	20573	6507	0	0	 0
TNMD	3281	 7167	 3435	0	 0	0	  202	  403	 203	0	0	21


SRP021193.colData.tsv:
	diagnosis	group	LibrarySelection
CASE_1	non-ischemic cardiomyopathy	CASE	cDNA


response:
```
# Load necessary packages
library(openxlsx)

# Read count table
count_table <- read.xlsx("Supplementary_Table_1_exp.xlsx", sheet = 1, startRow = 2, colNames = FALSE)
num_rows_count_table <- nrow(count_table)
num_cols_count_table <- ncol(count_table)

# Read annotation data
annotation_data <- read.table("SRP021193.colData.tsv", header = TRUE)
num_rows_annotation_data <- nrow(annotation_data)
num_cols_annotation_data <- ncol(annotation_data)

# Print the number of rows and columns for each table
print(paste("Number of rows in count table:", num_rows_count_table))
print(paste("Number of columns in count table:", num_cols_count_table))
print(paste("Number of rows in annotation data:", num_rows_annotation_data))
print(paste("Number of columns in annotation data:", num_cols_annotation_data))
```
Note: This code assumes that the count table starts on the second row of the first sheet of the Excel file and that the annotation data is in a tab-separated text file. Adjust the file paths and sheet numbers if necessary.
